books.title: Smart but Scattered
books.author: Peg Dawson & Richard Guare
books.summary: Explains executive function skills in children and provides practical strategies to improve organization, time management, and emotional control.
books.generative_title: Smart but Scattered by Peg Dawson & Richard Guare

books.title: Executive Function Difficulties: A Practical Guide to Assessment and Intervention
books.author: Jill Fahy
books.summary: Provides a detailed look at how executive functions are assessed and how parents and educators can support children with specific EF deficits.
books.generative_title: Executive Function Difficulties: A Practical Guide to Assessment and Intervention by Jill Fahy

books.title: The Whole-Brain Child
books.author: Daniel J. Siegel & Tina Payne Bryson
books.summary: Combines neuroscience and parenting advice to help children build emotional balance and resilience — key elements of executive function.
books.generative_title: The Whole-Brain Child by Daniel J. Siegel & Tina Payne Bryson

books.title: Mind in the Making: The Seven Essential Life Skills Every Child Needs
books.author: Ellen Galinsky
books.summary: Highlights seven essential life skills, grounded in executive function research, and provides hands-on activities for parents and teachers.
books.generative_title: Mind in the Making: The Seven Essential Life Skills Every Child Needs by Ellen Galinsky

books.title: Late, Lost, and Unprepared: A Parents' Guide to Helping Children with Executive Functioning
books.author: Joyce Cooper-Kahn & Laurie Dietzel
books.summary: Offers actionable, parent-friendly strategies to support kids who face challenges with planning, flexibility, and follow-through.
books.generative_title: Late, Lost, and Unprepared: A Parents' Guide to Helping Children with Executive Functioning by Joyce Cooper-Kahn & Laurie Dietzel

books.title: The Explosive Child
books.author: Ross W. Greene
books.summary: Teaches the Collaborative & Proactive Solutions approach to help children manage frustration, improve flexibility, and strengthen problem-solving.
books.generative_title: The Explosive Child by Ross W. Greene

books.title: Smart but Scattered Teens
books.author: Richard Guare, Peg Dawson & Colin Guare
books.summary: A continuation of 'Smart but Scattered' focusing on helping teens strengthen organization, time management, and goal-setting skills.
books.generative_title: Smart but Scattered Teens by Richard Guare, Peg Dawson & Colin Guare

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens
books.author: Sean Covey
books.summary: Presents a framework for teens to develop independence, responsibility, and effective habits aligned with executive functioning.
books.generative_title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens by Sean Covey
